definition: A task or occupation that one engages in to earn a living, typically involving specific skills or expertise. It is commonly used to refer to paid employment or work-related activities.

examples.german: Ich habe einen neuen Job gefunden.

examples.english: She works in an office job.

examples.german: Mein Traumjob ist es, Schriftsteller zu sein.
examples.english: My dream job is to be a writer.

examples.german: Er hat einen gut bezahlten Job.
